trans-unit.source: Specifies the dimensions of the margins of a printed page.
trans-unit.target: Specifica le dimensioni dei margini di una pagina stampata.

trans-unit.source: The Margins class is used to manipulate the width of margins in <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: La classe margini viene utilizzata per modificare la larghezza dei margini e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter> is the type descriptor for this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter>è il descrittore di tipo per questa classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom%2A> are properties that define the margins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom%2A>sono proprietà che definiscono i margini.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Clone%2A> creates an identical Margins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Clone%2A>Crea un margini identici.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%2A> determines if another object has the same dimensions as a Margins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%2A>Determina se un altro oggetto ha le stesse dimensioni come un margini.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> class with 1-inch wide margins.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> classe con margini 1 pollice.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> class with the specified left, right, top, and bottom margins.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> classe con il valore sinistro, destro, superiore, margini e inferiore.

trans-unit.source: The left margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Il margine sinistro, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: The right margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Il margine destro, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: The top margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Il margine superiore, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: The bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Il margine inferiore, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: The left parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Il left valore del parametro è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The right parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - o - right valore del parametro è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The top parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - o - top valore del parametro è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The bottom parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - o - bottom valore del parametro è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il margine inferiore, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se si esegue una misurazione margini in millimetri, moltiplicare il margine larghezza desiderata in millimetri da 3,937 per determinare la misura corretta in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si desidera un margine di 25mm, moltiplicare per 3,937 è 98 quando arrotondato per difetto.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Impostare quindi appropriata <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>membro a 98.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>

trans-unit.source: The bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Il margine inferiore, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: The Bottom property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà nella parte inferiore è impostata su un valore che è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a duplicate of this object, member by member.
trans-unit.target: Recupera un duplicato di questo oggetto, il membro per membro.

trans-unit.source: A duplicate of this object.
trans-unit.target: Un duplicato di questo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Object> to determine whether they have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Confronta questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> specificata <xref:System.Object>per determinare se hanno le stesse dimensioni.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The object to which to compare this <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto con cui confrontare questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> and has the same <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left*> values as this <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto specificato è un <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> e ha lo stesso <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *> e <> </> *> i valori come questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates and retrieves a hash code based on the width of the left, right, top, and bottom margins.
trans-unit.target: Calcola e recupera un codice hash in base alla larghezza di sinistra, destra, margini superiore e inferiore.

trans-unit.source: A hash code based on the left, right, top, and bottom margins.
trans-unit.target: Un codice hash basato di sinistra, destra, margini superiore e inferiore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the left margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la larghezza del margine sinistro, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se si esegue una misurazione margini in millimetri, moltiplicare il margine larghezza desiderata in millimetri da 3,937 per determinare la misura corretta in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si desidera un margine di 25mm, moltiplicare per 3,937 è 98 quando arrotondato per difetto.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Impostare quindi appropriata <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>membro a 98.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>

trans-unit.source: The left margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Larghezza del margine sinistro, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: The Left property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà a sinistra è impostata su un valore che è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to determine if they have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> per determinare se hanno le stesse dimensioni.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> da confrontare per verificarne l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> da confrontare per verificarne l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top*>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom*> properties of both margins have the same value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare il <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *> le proprietà di entrambi i margini hanno lo stesso valore; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to determine whether they are of unequal width.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> per determinare se sono di larghezza diversa.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> da confrontare per verificarne la disuguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> da confrontare per verificarne la disuguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate if the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top*>, or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom*> properties of both margins are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare se il <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, o <> </> *> le proprietà di entrambi i margini non sono uguali; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the right margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la larghezza del margine destro, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se si esegue una misurazione margini in millimetri, moltiplicare il margine larghezza desiderata in millimetri da 3,937 per determinare la misura corretta in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si desidera un margine di 25mm, moltiplicare per 3,937 è 98 arrotondato.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Impostare quindi appropriata <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>membro a 98.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>

trans-unit.source: The right margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Larghezza del margine destro, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: The Right property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di destra è impostata su un valore che è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the top margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la larghezza del margine superiore, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se si esegue una misurazione margini in millimetri, moltiplicare la larghezza del margine desiderato in millimetri da 3,937 per determinare la misura corretta in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si desidera un margine di 25mm, moltiplicare per 3,937 è 98 quando arrotondato per difetto.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Impostare quindi appropriata <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>membro a 98.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>

trans-unit.source: The top margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Larghezza del margine superiore, in centesimi di pollice.

trans-unit.source: The Top property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Top è impostata su un valore che è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Converts the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to a string.
trans-unit.target: Converte il <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> in una stringa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representation of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>rappresentazione di <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>
